solution_line_template: Michael's watermelon weighs {michael_watermelon_weight} pounds and Clay's weighs {clay_multiplier} times that so it weighs {michael_watermelon_weight}*{clay_multiplier} = <<{michael_watermelon_weight}*{clay_multiplier}={clay_watermelon_weight}>>{clay_watermelon_weight} pounds

John's watermelon is half the size of Clay's {clay_watermelon_weight}-pound watermelon so it weighs {clay_watermelon_weight}/{john_divisor} = <<{clay_watermelon_weight}/{john_divisor}={john_watermelon_weight}>>{john_watermelon_weight} pounds
